channel.title: InfoScope OSINT Updates
channel.description: Latest updates, new tools, and features from InfoScope OSINT - Advanced Open Source Intelligence Platform

item.title: InfoScope OSINT v2.0 - Enhanced Platform with 50+ Tools
item.description: Major platform update with 12 new built-in tools, enhanced mobile interface, advanced SEO optimization, and improved user experience. Now featuring subdomain enumeration, port scanning, email intelligence, and social media analysis tools.
item.author: updates@infoscope-osint.web.app (InfoScope OSINT Team)

item.title: New Built-in OSINT Tools Available
item.description: Introducing 12 powerful built-in OSINT tools including advanced subdomain enumeration, comprehensive port scanning, DNS intelligence suite, enhanced WHOIS lookup, IP geolocation intelligence, email analysis suite, user reconnaissance tools, GitHub intelligence, website profiler, URL analyzer, social media intelligence, and phone number analysis.
item.author: updates@infoscope-osint.web.app (InfoScope OSINT Team)

item.title: Mobile-First Responsive Design Launch
item.description: InfoScope OSINT now features a completely redesigned mobile-first interface with enhanced navigation, touch-optimized controls, and improved accessibility across all devices.
item.author: updates@infoscope-osint.web.app (InfoScope OSINT Team)
